agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Ambition affirms a clarity of purpose and the will to achieve it!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Ambition affirms a clarity of purpose and the will to achieve it!"

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Ambition infers a willingness to succeed at the expense of everything - and everyone - else!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Ambition infers a willingness to succeed at the expense of everything - and everyone - else!"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Ambition affirms a clarity of purpose and the will to achieve it!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Arrogance is harmless, if sometimes tiresome."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Arrogance is harmless, if sometimes tiresome."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Self-importance, often at the expense of others; arrogance is a terrible thing."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Self-importance, often at the expense of others; arrogance is a terrible thing."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "You hear nothing over the sound of your arrogant prattle."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "You hear nothing over the sound of your arrogant prattle."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Is it arrogant to think that one is rather splendid?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Is it arrogant to think that one is rather splendid?"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "The world is filled with beautiful things; beautiful people, too!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "The world is filled with beautiful things; beautiful people, too!"

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Beauty only serves to hide the ugliness within."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Beauty only serves to hide the ugliness within."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "Your beauty only serves to hide the ugliness within."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Hello, what have we here?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Hello, what have we here?"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Bravery allows one to face - and overcome! - even the greatest of challenges."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Bravery allows one to face - and overcome! - even the greatest of challenges."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Bravery? Such heroic nonsense."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Bravery? Such heroic nonsense."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "What use is bravery when you're dead?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "What use is bravery when you're dead?"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "My brave deeds will be the stuff of legend!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "My brave deeds will be the stuff of legend!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "With all the world in turmoil, one can forgive the occasional careless mistake."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "With all the world in turmoil, one can forgive the occasional careless mistake."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "The carelessness of others will be the undoing of us all."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "The carelessness of others will be the undoing of us all."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "Your carelessness will be your undoing."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "Your carelessness will be your undoing."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Careless? Whatever do you... Oops!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Careless? Whatever do you... Oops!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Tread cautiously and you will never stumble."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Tread cautiously and you will never stumble."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Caution is the enemy of progress."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Through charity we can elevate the unfortunate for the betterment of us all."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Needless waste in the name of charitable service is needless waste, regardless."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Competition is a breeding ground for excellence and innovation."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Sometimes one must be cruel to be kind."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "It is our duty to care for those who have given their all for us."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "I say it is survival of the fittest!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "I say it is survival of the fittest!"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "If you'd lived through what I had, you wouldn't look half as good!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "If you're going to act, act decisively; don't talk."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "With energy and vigour, is there nothing one can't achieve?!?"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "There is merit in being flexible, adaptable, ready for anything."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Good food is but one of life's simple pleasures."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Good food is but one of life's simple pleasures."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Scarcity and starvation abound; there is no place in this world for a glutton."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Scarcity and starvation abound; there is no place in this world for a glutton."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "If I saw you whilst eating, I would be unable to finish my meal!"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "We'll have the lot. And don't skimp on the pork."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "It is not greedy to exercise one's right to all the wonderful things."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "It is not greedy to exercise one's right to all the wonderful things."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "To be greedy for everything is to appreciate nothing."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "One is not greedy for exercising one's right to all the wonderful things."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "When one plays the game of life, one must prepare for some heartbreak."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Honour your friends; honour your enemies; honour yourself."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Honour your friends; honour your enemies; honour yourself."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Honour is hypocrisy; codifying one's hostility doesn't make it any less wrong!"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "If we fight, it will be with honour; face-to-face, and both of us armed!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Impulsiveness offers relief from the burden of doubt and the regret of inaction."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "To act on impulse is to risk making avoidable - and irreversible! - mistakes."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Impulse to fight, impulse to win!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Patience is a virtue."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "I perceive that you too are one to appreciate the finer details of the world."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "I perceive that you too are one to appreciate the finer details of the world."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Perceptive? I hadn't noticed."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Perceptive? I hadn't noticed."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "Perceptive? I hadn't noticed."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "Perceptive? I hadn't noticed."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "I perceive that you too may be one to appreciate the finer details of the world."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "I perceive that you too may be one to appreciate the finer details of the world."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Refinement makes the man."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Refinement makes the man."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "If one must be refined, perhaps one is not worthy to begin with!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "If one must be refined, perhaps one is not worthy to begin with!"

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "You put great stock in acting refined; perhaps you are not so worthy to begin with!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "You put great stock in acting refined; perhaps you are not so worthy to begin with!"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Such poise; such grace; such refinement!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Such poise; such grace; such refinement!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "A good scar is the sign of a good fight!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "A good scar is the sign of a good fight!"

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Unsightly, and a sure sign that the enemy got the better of you!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Unsightly, and a sure sign that the enemy got the better of you!"

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "Unsightly, and a sure sign that the enemy got the better of you!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "Unsightly, and a sure sign that the enemy got the better of you!"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Isn't this a beauty of a scar?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Isn't this a beauty of a scar?"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Nobody asks for sickness; we must comfort, and - if possible - heal."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Nobody asks for sickness; we must comfort, and - if possible - heal."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Keep the sick well away, I say, lest they bring low the fit and the strong!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Keep the sick well away, I say, lest they bring low the fit and the strong!"

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "I would shake your hand, but I fear I might catch something."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "I would shake your hand, but I fear I might catch something."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "What ails you, my friend?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "What ails you, my friend?"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "There are many opportunities to be found in social pursuits."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "There are many opportunities to be found in social pursuits."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "The socially-obsessed do nothing but lose themselves amongst a sea of fools."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "The socially-obsessed do nothing but lose themselves amongst a sea of fools."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "You do nothing but lose yourself amongst a sea of fools."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "You do nothing but lose yourself amongst a sea of fools."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Stay awhile and talk!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Stay awhile and talk!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "With great strength comes great potential."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "With great strength comes great potential."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "What good is strength if you haven't the sense to guide it?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "What good is strength if you haven't the sense to guide it?"

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "What good is strength if you haven't the sense to guide it?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "What good is strength if you haven't the sense to guide it?"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "I have the strength of an ox that has the strength of two oxen!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "I have the strength of an ox that has the strength of two oxen!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "It is sometimes necessary to fall back on superstition to make sense of the world."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "It is sometimes necessary to fall back on superstition to make sense of the world."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Superstition is an affront to rational thought!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Superstition is an affront to rational thought!"

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "Your superstitions are a dangerous affront to common sense."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "Your superstitions are a dangerous affront to common sense."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Superstitious? The spirits have confided in me that I am no such thing!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Superstitious? The spirits have confided in me that I am no such thing!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Today, we fight together. Tonight, we shall feast together."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Today, we fight together. Tonight, we shall feast together."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Where an army cannot tread, one arrow can topple a nation."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Where an army cannot tread, one arrow can topple a nation."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "Where an army cannot tread, one arrow can topple a nation."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "Where an army cannot tread, one arrow can topple a nation."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Today, we fight together. Tonight, we shall feast together."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Today, we fight together. Tonight, we shall feast together."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "For the emperor!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "For the emperor!"

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "This is a time of new Emperors."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "This is a time of new Emperors."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "This is a time of new emperors."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "This is a time of new emperors."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "For the emperor!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "For the emperor!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Titles are a just reward, well earned, for diligent service to one's lord."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Titles are a just reward, well earned, for diligent service to one's lord."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Empty titles, empty minds."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Empty titles, empty minds."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "Empty titles, empty minds."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "Empty titles, empty minds."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Do you know who I am?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Do you know who I am?"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "By travel and trade, one can prosper."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "By travel and trade, one can prosper."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Trade leads to dangerous borders, and agents within our lands."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Trade leads to dangerous borders, and agents within our lands."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "Trade leads to dangerous borders, and agents within our lands."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "Trade leads to dangerous borders, and agents within our lands."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "By travel and trade, we can prosper."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "By travel and trade, we can prosper."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Our traditions instil the hearts of our people and keep our culture alive."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Our traditions instil the hearts of our people and keep our culture alive."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "The old ways are not strictly the good ways."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "The old ways are not strictly the good ways."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "The old ways are not strictly the good ways."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "The old ways are not strictly the good ways."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Our traditions instil the hearts of our people and keep our culture alive."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Our traditions instil the hearts of our people and keep our culture alive."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Trust, and you are worthy of being trusted."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Trust, and you are worthy of being trusted."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "If one never trusts, one may never be betrayed."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "If one never trusts, one may never be betrayed."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "If one never trusts, one may never be betrayed."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "If one never trusts, one may never be betrayed."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Myself? I'd trust you to the end of the world."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Myself? I'd trust you to the end of the world."

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Vanity... Definitely my favourite vice."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Vanity... Definitely my favourite vice."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "With vanity, who needs the approval of others?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "With vanity, who needs the approval of others?"

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "With vanity such as yours, who needs the approval of others?"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "With vanity such as yours, who needs the approval of others?"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Vainglory is glory, nonetheless. And I am the most glorious of all!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Vainglory is glory, nonetheless. And I am the most glorious of all!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "War... What is it good for? Absolutely everything."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "War... What is it good for? Absolutely everything."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Warlike pursuits have tragic ends."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Warlike pursuits have tragic ends."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "Your warlike pursuits will have tragic ends."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "Your warlike pursuits will have tragic ends."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Let sound the drums of war, and we can meet upon the field of battle!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Let sound the drums of war, and we can meet upon the field of battle!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "Not everyone can - nor should have to be! - an exemplar of physical fitness."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "Not everyone can - nor should have to be! - an exemplar of physical fitness."

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "In this merciless world, only the fittest are worthy of survival."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "In this merciless world, only the fittest are worthy of survival."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "In this merciless world, only the fittest are worthy of survival. You are unworthy."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "In this merciless world, only the fittest are worthy of survival. You are unworthy."

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "Weak of body, perhaps, but no less strong of mind and spirit!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "Weak of body, perhaps, but no less strong of mind and spirit!"

agreement_description.last_approved_text: "For the Yellow Sky!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.agreement_description: "For the Yellow Sky!"

disagreement_description.last_approved_text: "Nothing but a pack of filthy rebels."

character_relationship_opinion_topics.disagreement_description: "Nothing but a pack of filthy rebels."

dislike_is_description.last_approved_text: "You perfidious rebels!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.dislike_is_description: "You perfidious rebels!"

like_is_description.last_approved_text: "For the Yellow Sky!"

character_relationship_opinion_topics.like_is_description: "For the Yellow Sky!"
